Container.Overview: Bacula is a network Client/Server based backup program. This app contains also Baculum, web environment to easy manage with the Bacula programs. If You do not havy any postgresql server, You could chose sqlite3 version, but this version is not recomended. Please check ReadMe before You start. Default Tag is 11 sqlite3 version.

Container.Description: Bacula is a network Client/Server based backup program. Baculum is web environment to easy work with the Bacula programs. If You do not havy any postgresql server, You could chose sqlite3 versions, but this version is not recomended. Please read support thread before You start. Default Tag is 11 sqlite3 version.
